caption.title: Comparison of variances between binomial and poisson distributions.
caption.p:
Each panel shows a posterior distribution of Δ( S
t → I
t+1 ) given J obs ( J obs = 1, 10 or 50), assuming an uninformative flat prior and a likelihood function that follows either binomial (dashed line) or Poisson (filled line) distribution functions.
Click here for additional data file.
